title.value: METRO: MEMORY-ENHANCED TRANSFORMER FOR RETROSYNTHETIC PLANNING VIA REACTION TREE
title.justification: Title mentioned at the beginning of the paper
title.quote: METRO: MEMORY-ENHANCED TRANSFORMER FOR RETROSYNTHETIC PLANNING VIA REACTION TREE

extractions.description: This paper proposes Metro, a Memory-Enhanced Transformer model for retrosynthetic planning via reaction trees. A new benchmark of 124,869 reaction trees is created from the USPTO-full dataset. Experimental results show that Metro significantly outperforms existing models in top-1 accuracy, demonstrating the importance of context information in retrosynthetic planning.

type.justification: The paper conducts extensive experiments to validate the performance of the proposed Metro model against baselines.
type.quote: Extensive experiments show that Metro dramatically outperforms existing single-step retrosynthesis models by at least 10.7% in top-1 accuracy.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the application of deep learning in retrosynthetic planning, crucial for drug discovery and organic chemistry.
